title: Come chat with me and other Curbalers on our newly created Discord server
excerpt: Come and join us to Curbal's discord server where we can discuss anything about data and Power BI. Click this link to access the server: https://discord.gg/7QWDRDT  See u there!!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel
